name: text_processor
prompt: My app will open a text file, read it and help to search for specific words, and sentences inside the text. It will act similar to the grep command in linux. The user can provide the file name to process or he can open the file content and pipe it to this app.
tasks: ### Command Line App Description:

The "text_processor" command line app will open a text file, read its content, and allow users to search for specific words and sentences within the text. Users can provide the file name as an argument to process or pipe the file content directly to the app.
### User Stories:
1. As a user, I want to be able to run the "text_processor" app from the command line.
2. As a user, I want to be able to specify the file name as an argument to process a specific text file.
3. As a user, I want to be able to pipe the content of a text file directly to the "text_processor" app.
4. As a user, I want to be able to search for specific words within the text content.
5. As a user, I want to be able to search for specific sentences within the text content.
6. As a user, I want to see the line number where the word or sentence was found in the text.
7. As a user, I want to be able to search for multiple words or sentences at once.
8. As a user, I want to be able to specify if the search should be case-sensitive or case-insensitive.
9. As a user, I want to see the total count of occurrences for each word or sentence found.
10. As a user, I want to be able to specify the output format (e.g., plain text, JSON).
11. As a user, I want to be able to save the search results to a file.
### Additional Questions:
1. Should the search results display the context around the found word or sentence?
2. Should the app support regular expressions for advanced search patterns?
3. Should there be an option to highlight the found words or sentences in the output?
4. Should the app support searching for words or sentences across multiple files?
5. Should there be an option to limit the number of search results displayed?
6. Should the app provide statistics about the search results (e.g., total words searched, total sentences searched)?
7. Should there be an option to exclude certain words or sentences from the search results?
